content: Tried to give this game a chance but the tutorial is absolutely no help. The fact that after you choose a card it flips over and you have to long press 15+ cards after the first "age" just to remember what you have is horrendous. You can't change the AI level. There is no rules page to look at (I had to close the app and look up the rules on line) so if you have any questions while learning, you are screwed. I wish I had not waited too long to get a refund.
Wonderful, addictive game!
I love the game and I love the app but I hate the matchmaking in the friend system. An update, maybe two, would go a long way.

Disappointing level of bugs for what would otherwise be a great app version. I've had games with my friends become desynchronised where I can't select cards or see which cards get played, and a few times I've been unable to build wonders even though they have 0 cost (and there aren't 7 wonders on the board yet). It's disappointing as having all of your options available is important in this game and it's no fun having your options constrained by bugs.

It's a great game and the app works well but it needs some improvement. In the online matches connection is lost when I get a phone call. You should be able to leave the app without losing the match. Just make it so that your timer keeps going down and then auto discard just like it does if you take too long on your turn. You could then make forfeit after 2 or 3 missed turns. Also, there should be some kind of online matchmaking and progression. AI is weak too but I just play online.
This is a great game and a good adaption of the actual board game.
Love this game. Please add the two expansions!!

It's got a lot better but I find it weird how it doesn't show our ELO score when we play other people. I want to know their rank and rank of our friends list. Also it should have tournaments that can be played over a week. Always having three or four games on the go would be excellent.
Such a fun game with beatiful art! The ancient city theme is marvelous! This app is good on either a phone or a tablet.
App stops working in the middle of a game and doesn't save progress. No way to save or recover progress at all. And I was totally winning!
Flawless game. The app is perfectly designed.
Wont load on pixelbook go.
Horribly distorted and "tinny" sound. Waiting to see if developer will help me fix the problem. Will adjust rating accordingly. Seems to be a pretty cool rendition of the tabletop game which i love.

My brother & I purchased this since he's played the board game & we enjoy Thru The Ages. It took about 1 hr to figure out how to start a game together (need to be on the app at the same time to start a duel). I accidentally closed the app using my phone, which forfeits the game! So you need to be on the app at the same time & to stay on it / have it open to play. How does this work for people who live in different time zones? Or need to use phone for something else?
Just like the board game version. Excellent
Minor in-game lag, but great game overall. If your phone doesn't suck, and your network doesn't suck, haven't had many issues.
Osome
Doesn't work on my Chromebook or tablet. All I get is a black screen with music.
GREAT adaptation of 7 Wonders for two players
Great interface. Pretty good AI opponent. Fast games. Worthwhile port of the analog version.
Terrible Graphic and gameplay. Definitely not worth the money.

I love this board game! When I found out there was an app, I had to get it! Sadly, this was beyond disappointing. Running the OnePlus 7 Pro, I achieved what seems like 5 fps. The sound is extremely distorted and sounds like a mechanical nightmare. The graphics on the highest quality is comparable to CD-I Zelda games. Attempts to contact the developer and mentioning the bug fixes has been futile. It's frustrating to buy the game, get a non-working product, and not be able to receive a refund.
Love it. Hope the expansion is addedüòç
Problem with The Appian Way (Wonder.) Does NOT remove any coins from AI/opponent when constructed.

Just like original version! So much fun. I just with you could communicate with your opponent. Maybe just a list of things to chose from like... "good game" or " play again?" Or " your going down" or "that was a bad beating"...
I play the board game and this is a great way to play. Would love to see Pantheon available!

This is one of my favorite board games, so I wanted to download the app regardless of the negative reviews I was seeing. I have since played a number of online matches and vs the ai and I honestly love it! I match with another player very quickly, the ai is a decent competitor, and the controls are intuitive. The two things holding this back from being 5 stars are asynchronous play and global rankings.

This app is not worth the money. It can barely keep a connection long enough to actually play a game. It takes FOREVER to match you with a random opponent, IF it ever does. It's glitchy as all hell. It selects cards I am not a pressing on, and sometimes it does not let me take an action on my turn causing me to lose my turn completely. It's really unfortunate that such a great game was turned into this hot mess. Hope it improves.
The perfect version of this game for phones and tablets. I haven't experienced any instability. If I was going to be picked, I would love a 'play again' button.
The games is great. The interface and art design makes it difficult to understand what's going on. It needs to be cleaner.
Good in AI mode. Haven't had any issues on local network multiplayer, and online multiplayer has been stable for a few weeks, so I'm upping my rating
Fun and great time killer

I wish I could rate this app 5 stars... Unfortunately it's impossible. I am sick of it. I play (or should I say "try to") with my friend online but most of the time it is impossible to synchronize and start the game. When we finally are able to start, most of the time we will be disconnected in the middle of the game. Maybe we can finish a game 2 out of 10 time. I contacted already repo and they told me they will look at it. So far zero improvement. They should refund us it's unacceptable!
Sound is all messed up. Works great for local multiplayer. Haven't tried online yet. Release the expansion please.

This game is not functional for online multiplayer. Both friends must be online at the exact same time to start a match. Matches frequently accidentally end too early because the turn timer is too short and has no adjustment. No option for asynchronous play like other similar games. The developer has not even put in the work to make sure the game functions on a tablet, it is "unavailable" for tablets in the app store. Expected way more for a paid game (and an expensive one at that)

I enjoy this game and I think its a good adaptation from the board game. My main criticism is that the AI only has one skill level. It would be aswesome since that there isn't a campaign mode - the AI game could be customized.

Works well if you can connect to a game. Several typos/spelling errors/visual bugs. Edit: Many of the connection issues and menu bugs have been fixed after the first big update. Mostly just untranslated French and errors on the loading screen quotes remain. Hope they can add the promo wonders and Pantheon expansion.
replyContent: Hi Vincent, thank you for your feedbacks. If you want to, uou can send us information by email (app@rprod.com) on any issue or typo you encounter, we'll fix that ;)

content: Buggy at times but works well most of the time. Have been hooked to this game right from day 1. Seems like a fine adaptation of the original board game.
So fun, exactly like the card game (which is one of the best 2 player games I've found)

This app is actually pretty good! Having seen some of the early versions during development, I am totally blown away by the end game as its really good by comparison. The only things that are really bugging us is that if you're playing with someone side by side or face to face, 1) when you play your move it immediately switches to the other player, you don't get a chance to see what cards are revealed next 2) when asking which player should go first, it doesn't show you the cost of each card.

Multiplayer seems buggy. Can't connect. Single player is fun and easy to play. AI is good. Looking forward to giving 5 stars once multiplayer is fixed. It'd also be nice to have some asynchronous play options. Edit: Multiplayer fixed!
replyContent: Hi Craig, thank you for your feedback. As the game just launched it can be sometime long to find online game. but this should rapidly become shorter with more players. For the asynchronous game it was been asked to us during the Beta and we are currently debating to add this options in future. But it's not planned yet.

content: Not able to create an account
replyContent: Jirawan, nous avons eu un souci d'accessibilit√© aux serveurs cet apr√®s midi. Mais c'est repartis ;)

content: Bought it to play with my friend, on the same network.... keeps giving me error 16, and nowhere does it say what error 16 is. Please fix!
replyContent: Hi Anita, can contact us via email (app@rprod.com) we may have some question for you. Thank you.

content: The best pass and play game

Love this game on tabletop, and digital when it actually works. Getting online matches started is few and far between. More often than not, I get stuck at the matchup screen and either get error #0 or it continuously says it's preparing the game and never changes. I've even gotten a forfeit losses from this somehow, which lost about 40 ELO rating points. Absolutely unacceptable. Also, the resolution on S10+ cuts off the other player's name due to the front camera.
Cards are too small to see.
Didn't work on my chromebook, had to get a refund.
Excellent digital adaptation! The game is clean, yet all important information easy to access or display. Will you add the expansion?
Vary good game, it needs a new expansion.
Good pretty good, I would love to see the expansions!

It' ok overall. I think the background of the area where the cards of each age are laid out should be a single color , or at least as less distractive as possible to ease the eyes, because there is already a lot of information on the screen (age cards, players cards with many symbols and colors that must be tracked by the eye) and it can be tiring especially on smaller screens.
I don't review often but I Love this game, by the app crashes and glitches often. I have a Samsung galaxy tab that's about 3 years old.
just need for tablet
Isn't working on on my chromebook
So when are we going to expect pantheon? XD
Great version of the game. Makes playing very easy and quick without the need to calculate resource costs and points manually. Wish it had more ai options for single player games. Recommended.
Great game. Love the shared screen feature that eliminates the need to pass the phone like other games.

I bought this game to prepare myself for the real deal. Admittedly I had to run through the tutorial a couple of times, not the fault of the tutorial, my fault for not RTFM. It is harder to play on a smaller screen and I hope to pick up a tablet soon. Excellent communication with the developers. I hope they include the expansion(s) soon. It would be nice if they included an undo.
Please give the option to play against a friend WITHOUT a timer. Otherwise great game.

I can see the devs are actively working on making this better. They've improved the matchmaking speed a lot, and the few small UI tweaks they made have made the game much more enjoyable! I hope they bring the Pantheon expansion in at some point.
Would have been great if a landscape mode had been supported. Having to hold my tablet throughout the whole game? No thanks. Uninstalled.

Had some bugs but now is perfect, if you enjoy the board game , buy it no hesitations, the only thing I would add it's a friend system where we can chat with the oponnent I would also add the list of all players by elo and show the elo in the begining of each match

I love 7 Wonders. The game is very fun to play. However, 7 Wonders Duel has a CHEATING AI! I understand that with a random element to a card game there will be times when things don't go your way. This game has every random element go the AI's way. I'm very disappointed in this because the random element to the traditional 7 Wonders game is random and fair. Developers need to learn how to increase challenge biased off of skill, not literally stack the deck against you.

Pretty smooth, just a few little gripes‚Äîthe current cost to the player of available cards and wonders aren't available from some screens, there aren't enough players yet for the "quick match" feature to work reliably. All in all a really good interface though. Still can't figure out how to create or sign in to an account though.
Great game and gorgeous on the phone, but loads to a blank screen on my pixel slate.
Only thing I miss is a more challenging AI and the expansion.

This is amazing skill based game! It is great copy of the board game, most of the bugs are already fixed, and I love that this game is constantly updated. I highly recommend this game for people, who like games with more skill involved than luck.
Good game and realistic from the actual board game. Only 4 stars as I prefer 7 wonders muti player myself, but app excellent and works seamlessly on android.

Great! Very close to the board game experience. An option to make ressources costs more visible without needing to click/highlight would be great. A landscape mode would have been nice. The real question is: When is Pantheon coming?
Had to refund after one game. Love Duel but this was full of bugs and typos, and crashed a few times. Might pick it up again when the devs finish it.
Awesome! Great interface. The AI is pretty good. And the Quick matches have been seamless.
Great game with decent graphics. Big fan of the board game, the app just needs an async option AND the ability to message your wife for a surprise game if she is offline ;)

Most (if not all) of the negative issues mentioned in previous comments have been fixed. This game plays very well. Each game is very quick and no two are the same. I've played the card game version a few times and this app has made me appreciate just how strong it is. You can't stick to formulaic strategies because it depends on what cards come out. There is definitely a luck element to this, which some people might not like. Personally though I would recommend it. Mid-weight strategy. Fun
Won't install, despite following Google's troubleshooting guide.
Game needs a bit more graphical work done. Also needs a mode where you can duel a friend and take turns while not playing at the same time.
Keeps crashing when started?
replyContent:
Hi Zine,
Don't hesitate to join us directly, you have multiple options to reach us in the settings menu. We can use more informations about your experience.

content: Great game now in app form, which plays very well. When playing solo it plays very fast!
The game itself is 5 stars. One of my favorite two player board /card games. The app is very bare bones though. If we get the pantheon expansion at the very least it will be a big improvement.
Good game when it works.. constantly disconnecting from games. I think there are alot of bugs still
Great adaptation of game. Only recommendations are to make it easier for online play. For example make a lobby, chat, and give option to remove time limit for turns.
Nice and fast implementation of the board game. AI is fine, but I expect it to get better and different kind of them.
Multiplayer works badly, and sometimes get disconnected , please fix

A great first version, far easier to use than the alpha. I like the artwork and the colored borders work really well. The AI does play fast, so a rewind option to see the last move made would be really helpful. Good job!

This is a faithful adaptation of the original board game. My main problem is the timing system. I don't enjoy the game when I don't have time to consider the whole board when taking my actions. Some strategies, like counting to a particular card in the board to ensure that the opponent doesn't get it, are almost impossible with the short time limit. Needs some kind of option to turn the timer off, or even leave the game entirely and pick it up when the opponent has made their turn.
I own and love the tabletop game. However this is a poor design.
During tutorial single tap advances through 2 tips. I know the rules but it may be frustrating for new players. More feedback later!
replyContent: Thank you Nick, we''ll take a look as you say this can be frustrating.

content: Great adaptation

Overall great design of the game. It is easy to use and looks really nice. My one complaint is that sometimes while playing online the game will just timeout, and freeze up. There is no way to recover the game.
replyContent: Hi Weber, and thank you for your feedback. Can you tell us more abbout the freeze by email (app@rprod.com) we'll take a look on this ;)

content: Good first version, but until some usability issues are resolved I won't be playing it. The positive is that the AI is clever and challenging. I would like to play it, but as-is, this is still in need of some improvements. 1) It's not very friendly for a small screen. The UI operation to get a card to display (which is supposed to be a long press, I think) isn't quite right. It's some long-press with a small move, but you have to do it *just so*. 2) Once a wonder is built, if I tap on the wonders to view it up close, the built wonder is not visible. I can't see what the AI paid to buy it, and I can't see what powers it granted the AI. 3) When playing the AI, the AI plays far, far far too quickly. When it selects a wonder or a building, I can't tell what it just took. Poof! The card is gone from the play area, and that's it. 3a) This is particularly worse when the AI takes a card, I have no idea what it's doing with it. I have to know what the AI's tableau already looked like, and what money, science tokens and military strength were beforehand just to know what it did. 3c) Worst is tying all of this together: the AI takes a card to build a wonder that destroys one of mine. Poof, poof, poof! All I know is one of my cards is gone, and it most have been because the AI built a wonder.. I don't even get to find out which card I lost. **that's awful.** 4) There's something I'd call a bug: during Wonder selection if I show settings, it overlays on top of the wonder selection area, but you can still see wonders. When tapping on a wonder, it takes it. It should NOT play the game while I'm looking through settings. 5) The choices for colors and borders for wonders to describe them as unplayed, played and available for purchase are far too similar to each other and the underlying background. 6) Why does it keep giving me game hints? I have played it three times, I know how it works. The game needs a little polish, I fear. It *will* be better, I'm sure.
replyContent: Thank you Robert for these feedbacks. When you have a lot of texte like that don't hesitate to send us an email instead, this tool is not really good for long text it's a bit hard for us to read and easy to miss your points. A lot of interesting points here, and i'm sure you will love the evolution ;)

content: Really smooth animations and the ui is great. Great implementation! Can't find anyone to play against yet, and not sure if multiplayer is asynchronous, but even if not, worth every penny
replyContent: Thank you Julian, Yes we have to wait a bit for more players to be able to find online game quickly. But if you don't like to wait you also can use the friend list for online games.

content: I'm the first oneüëç
